paper_abstract: We present examples from a reference implementation of variants of Kleene algebras and Tarski's relation algebras in the theorem proving environment Isabelle/HOL. For Kleene algebras we show how models can be programmed, including sets of traces and paths, languages, binary relations, max-plus and min-plus algebras, matrices, formal power series. For relation algebras we discuss primarily proof automation in a comprehensive library and present an advanced formalisation example. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Programming and automating mathematics in the Tarski-Kleene hierarchy
